select d.declaration_no, declaration_category, declaration_detail, declaration_date, (select count(*) from attacker where d.declaration_no=declaration_no) as attacker_count, reporter_name, declaration_insertdate, (select count(*) from declaration_attachment where d.declaration_no=declaration_no) as attach_count from declaration d join reporter_info r on d.reporter_no=r.reporter_no join join_police_declaration jpd on d.declaration_no=jpd.declaration_no join police using(police_no) WHERE POLICE_IDENTITY=#{policeId} ORDER BY declaration_insertdate desc

SELECT d.*, r.REPORTER_NAME, p.POLICE_NAME, p.POLICE_EMAIL, p.POLICE_GRADE FROM DECLARATION d JOIN REPORTER_INFO r ON d.REPORTER_NO = r.REPORTER_NO LEFT JOIN JOIN_POLICE_DECLARATION jpd ON d.DECLARATION_NO = jpd.DECLARATION_NO LEFT JOIN POLICE p ON jpd.POLICE_NO = p.POLICE_NO WHERE r.REPORTER_EMAIL = #{email} AND r.REPORTER_PASSWORD = #{password}
